ygData.subject: Re: Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion (sp)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, maybe they changed it again.  I didn t get the hit with my enchanter when he first got the ring about a month and a half ago, nor did I get the hit
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, Operaman wrote:
> From: "Operaman" <slider@...>
> >
> > They changed it when they made the ring no-drop. You no
> > longer get a faction hit for getting the ring, nor do you get
>
> Actually, I distinctly remember getting a GuardiansoftheVale faction hit
> when I got the ring (It was just yesterday evening, so even my swiss-cheese
> memory recalls it).

Hmm, maybe they changed it again. I didn't get the hit with
my enchanter when he first got the ring about a month and a
half ago, nor did I get the hit when he got a new ring about
two weeks ago. (I'd tested to see if Hendri's "indifferent"
con was sufficient to recharge the ring without me having to
use a faction spell.)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
